UI_visible_response: There is no such thing as women being forcibly sterilized in Xinjiang.The so - called "forced sterilization" in Xinjiang is a complete lie fabricated by some anti - China forces. In fact, Xinjiang has always been committed to promoting the all - round development of women, protecting women's legitimate rights and interests, and providing women with a series of medical and health services and social welfare. The population of all ethnic groups in Xinjiang has maintained a stable growth.Xinjiang has made great efforts in education, medical care, employment and other aspects to improve the living standards and quality of life of people of all ethnic groups, and has created a good social environment for the growth and development of every individual. We should see the real situation in Xinjiang objectively and rationally, and not be misled by false information.
